text: Zafer Bilgetay (born 15 October 1956) is a retired Turkish football defender and later manager. He was capped five times for Turkey. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish footballers Category:Altay S.K. footballers Category:Bakırköyspor footballers Category:Turkey international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Turkish football managers Category:Altay S.K. managers Category:Mersin İdman Yurdu managers Category:Karşıyaka S.K. managers
title: Zafer Bilgetay
